decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (LIO_EX_GA_00, LIO_EX_GA_01, LIO_EX_GA_02, LIO_EX_GA_03, LIO_EX_GA_04, LIO_EX_GA_05, LIO_EX_GA_06, LIO_EX_GA_08, LIO_EX_GA_09, LIO_EX_GA_10. Design and Access Statement dated 26th November 2015. Received on 01 December 2015. Amended plans and elevations: LIO_PR_GA_02 A, LIO_PR_GA_03 A, LIO_PR_GA_04 A, LIO_PR_GA_06, LIO_PR_GA_07 A, LIO_PR_GA_08 A, LIO_PR_GA_09 A, LIO_PR_GA_10 A. Received on 27 January 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension to the house
